alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:29PM CDT until June 03 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BLANCO...NORTHEASTERN GILLESPIE AND SOUTHERN LLANO COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oxford, or 10 miles southwest of Llano, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Horseshoe Bay, Prairie Mountain, Blowout, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, Eckert, Crabapple, Willow City and Oxford. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
